title: "Modelos lineales"
output: html_document
date: "2024-11-23"
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
```


```{r}
data <- read.csv('../data/DATA_FINAL.csv', sep = ';') %>% 
  select(Periodo, 
         PromedioVenta, 
         Promedio_Tasa_Fed,
         TBP,
         Nivel_IPC, 
         Var_Mensual_IPC,
         Nivel_IMAE,
         Nivel_IPPM, 
         Var_Mensual_IPPM,
         Nivel_IPPS, 
         Var_Mensual_IPPS,
         IPC_US, 
         Var_Mensual_US) %>% 
  mutate(Var_Mensual_IMAE = Nivel_IMAE/lag(Nivel_IMAE)-1,
         Periodo = dmy(Periodo),
         Q = (PromedioVenta*IPC_US)/Nivel_IPC,
         ) %>% 
  select(Periodo, 
         Q,
         Promedio_Tasa_Fed,
         TBP,
         Var_Mensual_IMAE, 
         Var_Mensual_IPC,
         Var_Mensual_IPPM,
         Var_Mensual_IPPS,
         Var_Mensual_US
         ) %>% 
  rename(inf_us = Var_Mensual_US, 
         inf = Var_Mensual_IPC) 
data
```


```{r}
read.csv('../data/DATA_FINAL.csv', sep = ';') %>% 
  select(Periodo, Nivel_IPC, IPC_US) %>% 
  filter(IPC_US==100)
```
